history.content: Hi I'm L&S CS intended and I have a question about a research internship I have over the summer at another university. It is not paid, so I would like to get units for it. How would I go about doing that, and finding a faculty advisor here, etc. The professor at the other university said that I can get an advisor here to "supervise" and he can just speak with them to tell them what I am working on and ascertain my progress. How can I get this process going?
history.subject: Getting Units for Research at another University
